title: BlackRock Profit Increases 20%
sub_head: The firm’s assets under management dipped from over $10 trillion to $9.6 trillion
body:
BlackRock Inc. reported higher quarterly profit even as market volatility lowered the investment firm’s assets under management to $9.6 trillion.
The world’s largest asset manager reported net income of $1.4 billion, or $9.35 a share, in the first quarter of 2022 ending March 31, up 20% from $1.2 billion in the same period a year earlier.
